meanings.sent1: The fish spawns new fish in the river.
meanings.sent2: The rabbit spawns baby bunnies in its burrow.
meanings.sent3: The bird spawns a whole family of chicks in its nest.
meanings.sent4: The apple tree spawns a multitude of apples every year.
meanings.sent5: The spider spawns many tiny spiderlings in its web.

meanings.definition: Give rise to or bring about
meanings.sent1: The rainy weather spawns puddles on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: The argument spawns tension between friends.
meanings.sent3: The joke spawns laughter among the audience.
meanings.sent4: The idea spawns creativity in the minds of artists.
meanings.sent5: The mistake spawns confusion in the classroom.

meanings.sent1: The turtle spawns its eggs on the sandy beach.
meanings.sent2: The frog spawns its eggs in the pond.
meanings.sent3: The chicken spawns its eggs in the cozy coop.
meanings.sent4: The fish spawns its eggs in the clear water.
meanings.sent5: The insect spawns its eggs in the hidden crevice.
